thebabycareproject

Class LoginPageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • thebabycareproject.LoginPageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LoginPageController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller of Login page(Initial fxml). Has ' sign in '(if user has created account) ' sign up '(to create account) and ' forgot Password ' (created account but doesn't remember password) features. Email and password are needed to sign in. Email needed to sign up and get new password. Uses local database to save and match email and password of the user.

        Finds out if the account is valid(If email with the given password is found in database)
